definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
the best part of the show is yet to come/(with ironic tone) the worst is yet to come/you ain't seen nothin' yet
pinyin: hao3 xi4 hai2 zai4 hou4 tou5

definition: when the mice drag a shovel, the biggest thing comes second/the tip of the iceberg/the cockroach principle
pinyin: lao3 shu3 tuo1 mu4 xian1 , da4 tou2 zai4 hou4 tou5
containing_words.word: 老鼠拖木锨，大头在后头

sentences.english: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.chinese: 在造船方面英国已落到日本后头了。

sentences.english: This made the driver following her brake hard.
sentences.chinese: 她这一停使得跟在后头的司机也来了个急刹车。

sentences.english: He is sitting behind Wang Min.
He dragged his injured foot behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他在后头拖着伤脚行进。

sentences.english: There are the blue lights of our friendly State Police in his mirror.
sentences.chinese: 咱们友好的州警察正跟后头闪着蓝灯呢。

sentences.english: Techniques using lexicons for content interpretation are yet to come.
sentences.chinese: 使用辞典作为满足的解释技术还在后头。

sentences.english: Outside the room there was a big open ground where many long-distance buses were parking.
sentences.chinese: 房外后头是一大片空地，停满了长途汽车。

sentences.english: The center was filled with seats a subull craptantiald the two rear wingls were lined with roundproof-glbumm-enclosed cubbyholes.
sentences.chinese: 这里在在都是长椅，玻璃文件架排成了后头的两堵墙。

sentences.english: The shark, excited by the smell of blood and the chase, went after him.
sentences.chinese: 那条鲨鱼受到血腥味以及捕食的刺激，紧追在他后头。

sentences.english: Digital TV would be displayed in rear seat monitors.
sentences.chinese: 数字电视将会出现在高端汽车后头枕上。

sentences.english: Aunt Selma and Uncle Murray paced.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔玛舅妈和默里舅舅跟在后头。

sentences.english: I followed, racing to get into my Sears, Roebuck bathing suit.
sentences.chinese: 我跟在后头，赶忙去穿我的西尔斯泳裤。

sentences.english: And it turns out that's not really the effect.
But for Piechowski, the biggest test was still to come.
sentences.chinese: 但是对佩特罗夫斯基来说，最大的考验还在后头。

definition: in front/in advance of the field
(of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
above/on top of/on the surface of
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
